title: InstantiateMsg
description: This structure describes the parameters for creating a contract.

amp_lp.description: Information about the amp[LP] Token for pool shares.

base_reward_token.description: the base reward token contract address

controller.description: The controller address to execute compound

staking_contract.description: The LP staking generator contract address

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

cw20_code_id.description: Code Id of the amp[LP] token

decimals.description: Number of decimals of the liquid staking token

name.description: Name of the liquid staking token

symbol.description: Symbol of the liquid staking token
